thread.title: Ground News - Big waves inundate Capitola village with seawater
thread.title_full: Ground News - Big waves inundate Capitola village with seawater

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Big waves inundate Capitola village with seawater
text:
Summary by Ground News Multiple inches of seawater covers roadways and sidewalks in Capitola village. Residents worry the high surf will cause more damage to beachfront properties and businesses. City workers removed garbage cans and closed roads in anticipation of the big waves. Crews are on schedule to complete the restoration project by this summer as long as it doesn't get torn apart.
